00064 class VTK_vtkParticleSpringSystem_EXPORT vtkParticle : public vtkObject {
00065 public:
00066 
00068     vtkTypeRevisionMacro(vtkParticle, vtkObject);
00070     static vtkParticle * New();
00072     void PrintSelf(ostream& os, vtkIndent indent);
00073 
00075     vtkSetMacro(Id, vtkIdType);                     // Id
00077     vtkGetMacro(Id, vtkIdType);
00079     void SetMass(double mass);
00081     vtkGetMacro(Mass, double);                      // Mass of the particle
00083     vtkGetMacro(InverseMass, double);
00085     vtkSetMacro(Fixed, bool);                       // Fix particle
00087     vtkSetMacro(Contacted, bool);                   // Contacted particle
00089     vtkGetMacro(Contacted, bool);
00090 
00092     vtkSetVector3Macro(Position, double);
00094     vtkGetVector3Macro(Position, double);
00096     void AddPosition(double x, double y, double z);
00097 
00099     vtkSetVector3Macro(Velocity, double);
00101     vtkGetVector3Macro(Velocity, double);
00102 
00104     vtkSetVector3Macro(Acceleration, double);
00106     vtkGetVector3Macro(Acceleration, double);
00107 
00109     vtkSetVector3Macro(Force, double);
00111     vtkGetVector3Macro(Force, double);
00113     void AddForce(double x, double y, double z);
00114 
00116 
00119     void Update();
00120 
00121 
00122 protected:
00123     vtkParticle();
00124     ~vtkParticle();
00125 
00127     vtkIdType Id;
00129     double Position[3];
00131     double Velocity[3];
00133     double Acceleration[3];
00135     double Force[3];
00136 
00138     double Mass;
00140     double InverseMass;
00142     bool Fixed;
00144     bool Contacted;
00145 
00146 private:
00147     vtkParticle(const vtkParticle&);            // Not implemented.
00148     void operator=(const vtkParticle&);           // Not implemented.
00149 
00150 };
